gasContract.terms: Please visit www.lumoenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer.
gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Regulatory Requirements. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to small business customers currently within the Ausnet Services Gas Central (Zone 1) distribution zone. For more information contact 1300 115 866.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us. No exit fees.
